protein.specific_function: Involved in pyrimidine base degradation. Catalyzes the reduction of uracil and thymine. Also involved the degradation of the chemotherapeutic drug 5-fluorouracil.

go_class.description: oxidoreductase activity, acting on the ch-ch group of donors
oxidoreductase activity, acting on the ch-ch group of donors, quinone or related compound as acceptor
nucleobase, nucleoside, nucleotide and nucleic acid metabolic process
nucleobase, nucleoside and nucleotide metabolic process
